name: @hubspot/calling-extensions-sdk
description: HubSpot calling extensions sdk for call widget integration.

scripts.build:test: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.publish:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid alpha && npm publish --access public --tag next
scripts.publish:beta: npm version prerelease --preid beta && npm publish --access public --tag beta
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:preminor: npm version preminor && npm run publish:alpha
scripts.publish:premajor: npm version premajor && npm run publish:alpha
scripts.test:serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run test:watch & jasmine-browser-runner serve --config=test/support/jasmine-browser.json
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run test:build && jasmine-browser-runner runSpecs --config=test/support/jasmine-browser.json --browser=headlessChrome
